The claim was published on Facebook on M: 2020, and has been shared more than 200 times.
The claim states that it now costs: 4 (over 5,000 Myanmar kyats) to open a Facebook account, and that there will be charges for creating new pages, groups, and publishing and sharing content.
An identical claim was shared in multipl: 4. Facebook spokesperson refuted the claim, stating that Facebook does not charge people to use the platform and that they only charge advertisers for showing ads. This information is also mentioned on Facebook's help center webpage and there is no mention of any changes to Facebook's pricing policy on their newsroom page.
